data.name: Microsoft, Surface Pro 10, 13", 512GB, Platinum, Tablets
data.short_description: Microsoft, Tablets, 13", 512GB Storage, Available in: JP
data.description:
General Information

  • Brand: Microsoft
  • Model: Microsoft Surface Pro 10 ZDW-00011
  • Color: Platinum
  • Operating System: Windows 11 Pro 23H2
  • Series: Surface Pro
  • Warranty: 1 year limited

Display

  • Screen Size: 13 inches
  • Resolution: 2880 x 1920
  • Touchscreen: Yes

Processor

  • CPU: 14th Generation Intel Core Ultra 7 Processor 165U (up to 4.9 GHz)
  • Number of Cores: 12

Memory

  • RAM: 16GB

Storage

  • Storage Type: SSD
  • Storage Capacity: 512GB

Connection and Ports

  • Other Connections: USB 4.0/Thunderbolt 4, USB-C x 2, SurfaceConnect, Surface keyboard port
  • Wireless Connectivity: IEEE802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax, Bluetooth 5.3

Battery and Power

  • Battery Life: Up to approx. 19 hours (assuming general use)
  • Power Consumption: Sleep: 0.4W, Idle: 4.2W
  • Power Adapter: Included

Other Features

  • Webcam: Front: Surface Studio Camera Ultra Wide Angle 114 Degree 1440p Quad HD, Rear: 10.5 MP Ultra HD Camera
  • Speakers: 2W stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos
  • Accessories: Power adapter, Quick start guide, Safety and warranty documents
  • Office: Microsoft 365 Apps (unapproved, 1 month trial version) pre-installed
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): approx. 287mm x 208.6mm x 9.3mm
  • Weight: 879g (main body)
